module.name: hipay_professional
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. You can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationConnect with 30+ million Skrill account holdersHighest security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktop

module.name: paypal
module.description: Benefit from PayPal's complete payment platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Benefit from PayPal's complete payment platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally . Your customers can pay with a selection of local and international debit and credit cards. Make online payments simple. PayPal customers can buy from you quickly if they use One Touch™  With more than 200 million active account holders, PayPal is a truly global payments platform that is available to people in more than 200 markets.

module.name: ogone
module.description: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone&n
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone
module.additional_description: There are many ways your business benefits from choosing Ingenico ePayments as its payments partner : We process and secure internet payments. Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.name: twenga
module.displayName: Advanced traffic acquisition on the Twenga network
module.description: Integrate your product feed onto the Twenga search engine, as well as on over 1,500 partner sites, thanks to Smart LEADS by Twenga Solutions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate your product feed onto the Twenga search engine, as well as on over 1,500 partner sites, thanks to Smart LEADS by Twenga Solutions.
module.additional_description: Smart LEADS is a completely automated qualified traffic acquisition solution, which is aimed at e-retailers of all sizes. It generates visibility and optimises advertising campaign performance, in real-time, within the Twenga network. This network includes Twenga's shopping engine websites and over 1,500 international partner sites including price comparison sites, shopping guides and editorial sites. About Smart LEADS: Smart LEADS analyses product performance using many different indicators (conversions, average spend, best selling products...).Customer profiling based on 40 different factors (search history, customer type, location, time...)Calculate buyers' affinity with your products.Rank products according to performance criteria and affinity, and push those with the highest probability of generating sales. This logic is applied, in real-time, for each product display on the Twenga network. Increase sales and improve revenue with a unique solution! 2* ConversionTarget highly qualified users and audiences3* ClientsSignificantly increase your sales and client base6* RevenueOptimise your cost per acquisition objectives at the finest level

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines.
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: avalaratax
module.description: Overview Avalara AvaTax provides the fastest, easiest, most accurate and affordable way to calculate sales tax within PrestaShop, manage exemption certificates, file retur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Overview Avalara AvaTax provides the fastest, easiest, most accurate and affordable way to calculate sales tax within PrestaShop, manage exemption certificates, file returns, and remit payments across multiple tax regions.
module.additional_description: AvaTax calculates accurate sales tax based on geo-spatial mapping.Your data is seamlessly integrated with PrestaShop.Tax reports at your fingertips, including tax returns and audits.Stress free returns processing. Your filing is done on time, every time. Guaranteed.For as little as $5/month!Get started today! http://www.avalara.com/integrations/prestashop/

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date.

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer. Google and PrestaShop increase your advertising investment by offering £75 after the first spent £25  (or 75€ for 25€ if you are not based in the UK) !  Download the module to get your promotional code and start your campaign now !
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.  Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Or call 08001690713

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with SendinBlue, easily create beautiful email campaigns and efficiently communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: realexredirect
module.description: Realex Payment’s online payments solution helps over 13,000 businesses sell online and securely processes billions in transactions every year
module.author: Coccinet
module.description_full: Realex Payment’s online payments solution helps over 13,000 businesses sell online and securely processes billions in transactions every year. We deliver an awesome payments experience and we have experts at hand to guide you every step of the way.   Be inspired by our 5 star Trustpilot rating: We know the value of personal customer service which is why you can always speak to a member of our support team, anytime.
module.additional_description: Productivity : Improve your website securityOur seamless payment page allows your customers to easily make payments online.We ensure you offer the perfect combination of payment methods to your customers allowing you to maximise online sales for your business. We deliver a fully customisable payment experience that integrates with your brand and is supported by our powerful technology.Our commitment to innovation ensures you have access to the latest payment technologiesOur payment solution includes 30+ fraud checks & 3D secure authentication.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.name: rees46

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A full suite of interconnected tools to turn visitors into customers, recover abandoned carts, reactivate and retain customers, and gain full control over online store growth.
module.additional_description: Set up REES46 once and manage all the necessary instruments with just one click.Increase revenue and customer engage.Reduce abandoned carts, reactivate 'sleeping' customers with personal offers.Analyse how things going on.

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more.  We offer the widest global support in the industry plus 110 different payment types including all of Tier 1 credit cards, diner cards, PayPal, E-checks and wire transfers. PrestaShop and BlueSnap help shoppers make purchases easily and securely with the free BlueSnap module.
module.additional_description: Sell globally with no developmentEasy all-in-one global payment module supportingVISA, MasterCard, Amex, Discover, JCB, Diners Club, Carte BleuePaypal, Alipay, Ukash, Skrill, and more+ 110 of the most preferred alternative payment methods worldwideDon’t install more than one module for paymentsReduce cart abandonment with localized checkout pagesModule automatically renders checkout page in shopper’s local language, local currency, and preferred local payment typeMore transactions approved because of our intelligent payment routing technologyCompetitive pricing starting at 2.9% + 30C per approved transactionCheckout page optimized for mobile and desktop

module.name: nostotagging
module.displayName: Nosto - The Complete Personalization Solution for PrestaShop
module.description: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are.
module.additional_description: Increase customer lifetime value, average order value and conversion by personalizing the whole funnel:Acquire - Drive qualified traffic to your storeConvert - Encourage hesitant shoppers to continue to the checkoutRetain - Produce loyal customers and inspire return visits to your storeOptimize - Have full control to continually improve performance ...all the personalization tools you need in one solution. Pay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yours
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 2 months trial
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SMB Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start, - it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount These are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system.

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Offer Klarna Checkout and Invoice/Account payments to your customers through Klarnas services. Your customers will pay for the order after delivery
module.author: Prestaworks
module.description_full: Offer Klarna Checkout and Invoice/Account payments to your customers through Klarnas services. Your customers will pay for the order after delivery.
module.additional_description: Easy to use It’s easy to get started with Klarna through the module developed by Prestaworks. Klarna’s fully automated invoices will minimize your administration.No risk, you will always get paid Klarna assumes all potential financial risks for both the consumer and the e-store, meaning the e-store always gets paid, since Klarna assumes the fraud and credit risk.Less friction, more sales Klarna maximizes conversion rates by simplifying buying for your e-store’s consumers. More people who enter the checkout will actually complete their purchase.Optimized for all devices Since there’s no login or need for filling out card numbers – Klarna’s payment methods will increase conversion. Without friction, mobiles can perform as well as desktops.Main features of Klarna Klarna Checkout will increase your conversion rate and allow your customers to pay for the goods after delivery.

module.name: 1and1hosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA.  Please click here to benefit from the UK special offer and here if you are based in Canada
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: alipay
module.displayName: Alipay Official - the leading ePayment solution for China
module.description: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions. It is a secure and convenient solution and preferred by over 400 million active members.
module.additional_description: What is Alipay? Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading third-party online payment solution for China. The significantly growing interest by Chinese shoppers in Western brands create large opportunities for Western companies with 67% of Chinese luxury spending occurring outside Chinese borders. If you are offering maternity products, food supplements, fashion, beauty or jewellery, Alipay will create an astonishing opportunity for you, opening up the Chinese market.

module.name: smartsupp

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do.
module.additional_description: Answer visitors' questions instantlyimprove customer relationsIncrease conversion rate (impact of Smartsupp on conversion rate is measurable in Google Analytics)Understand behavior of your customers

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: Amazon Pay makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Amazon Pay makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts. Amazon Pay can help merchants add new customers, increase sales and turn casual browsers into buyers. It’s fast, easy and trusted — leverage the Amazon brand to grow your business.  Please click here to register to Amazon Pay
module.additional_description: Make it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay in your Prestashop shop, using the addresses and payment information stored in their Amazon accounts. It's fast, simple and secure.

module.name: g2apay
module.description: G2A PAY is an online payment solution accepting 200+ global and local payment methods – assisting your business on its path to growth
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: G2A PAY is an online payment solution accepting 200+ global and local payment methods – assisting your business on its path to growth. Connect to customers from around the globe by localizing their buying experience, wherever they pay.
module.additional_description: Increased Conversion Rates Over 200 global and local payment methods in over 80 currencies allows your customers to pay with the payment methods with which they can identify and trust. G2A PAY provides you with a platform on which to display your products to an international market – while at the same time maintaining your existing customer base.

module.name: cartsguru
module.displayName: Carts Guru | Abandoned Cart Solution | Free Trial
module.description: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment. Carts Guru combines multichannel strategies to easily convert more than 20% of your abandoned carts through retargeting emails, SMS, automatic calls and Facebook.
module.additional_description: Carts Guru will help you to convert your "almost buyers" into paying customers. Multichannel Retargeting: Emails, Facebook Ads, Instagram, SMS, and Automatic CallsConvert more than 20% of your abandoned cartsAutomatic suggestions to continuously improve your rules Carts Guru is your all-in-one retargeting solution. Try it for free for 14 days, no credit card needed. You only pay a commission when Carts Guru converts your carts. Check our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: pilipay
module.displayName: 1-Click sell to China - PILIBABA all-in-one checkout
module.description: Pilibaba Extension provides major China Payment gateways(including AliPay, UnionPay , WeChatPay and 50+banks cards) and cheaper & effective logistics service for you sell to China as easy as 1-2-3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Pilibaba Extension provides major China Payment gateways(including AliPay, UnionPay , WeChatPay and 50+banks cards) and cheaper & effective logistics service for you sell to China as easy as 1-2-3 !
module.additional_description: Under Pilibaba's support, your website will obtain below features : 1. Get integration with PiliPay supported by UnionPay / AliPay / WechatPay to cover all user demands.2. Get clear guaranteed landed price checkout page in Chinese.3. Get Customs Compliance with all orders to avoid being returned.4. Get free marketing support -traffic generation in China market, 20 free publishing channels to greatly improve your brand recognition including frequently exposued products on our marketpalce http://www.pilibaba.com/cnTotally free work of translation and uploading.5. Get products descriptions in Chinese and localized introduction page of your products to raise conversion.6. Get domestic logistics support -shipping to a Pilibaba designated domestic warehouse all over the world with efficient re-label. Pilibaba handles customs clearance and door-to-door delivery anywhere in China professionally and efficiently.7. Get free mandarin after-sale and pre-sale service team to guarantee 100% customer satisfaction. Pre-installed in Prestashop, activate Pilibaba module within 1 minute and you are able to accept orders from 1.3 Billion Chinese customers immediately !

module.name: etranslation
module.description: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language. Don't miss the Cross-Border train! Invest in an optimised translation and make the most of our native translators and automatic content export and translation import tools
module.additional_description: Translation by qualified, native translators who are e-commerce specialistsA made-to-measure, personalised service. We are not a translation platform The most reasonable rates, thanks to our free repetition policy (an average of 20 to 35% of an e-commerce site is repeated)Automated content export and translation import

module.name: onehopsmsservice
module.description: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop. Whether it's sending auto confirmation messages or keeping your customers posted on the delivery status, Onehop can help you improve your Customer Interaction using SMS. Experience the magic of SMS!
module.additional_description: Feature Benefits: Merchants can easily interact with their customers via SMS. Merchants can send automated SMS alerts and notifications to their customers for: Order confirmation when an order is placed.Shipment confirmation when a product is shipped.Delivery confirmation when a product is delivered to the customer.Out of stock alerts for merchants to receive an update when a product is out of stock.Back in stock alerts for the customers when merchants update their stocks. Commercial Benefits: Discounts on purchase of a large volume of SMS credits* Service Benefits: Premium and instant support over Email, Call, Live Chat and Facebook. Free, on-call assistance with onboarding.

module.name: easywebtoapp
module.description: Create Amazing Mobile Apps for Google Play & iTunes that combine your responsive PrestaShop web store with powerful AppNotch native app features
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Create Amazing Mobile Apps for Google Play & iTunes that combine your responsive PrestaShop web store with powerful AppNotch native app features.
module.additional_description: As a PrestaShop store developer, you'll now be able to create powerful mobile apps to help your clients:      * Put Your Store on Your Customer's Phone* Make it Easy to do Business.* Be One Tap Away to Order* Keep Their People Engaged.* Get More Repeat Business.* Increase Your Site's SEO Ranking* Increase Repeat Orders with Your Store App* Boost Your Brand - Be in Google Play and iTunes.* Send Effective Push Notifications for Specials   What's great is you can help your clients grow their business while earning extra income on the exceptional work you already did. You already built a beautiful mobile friendly website for your client that gives their users a usable mobile experience. But, customers now want and expect easy, simple engagement. They want to go to their phone and tap an app icon not type a long website address to go where they want to go. They want to get timely alerts or receive push notifications letting them know of a great deal available to them. With Google now linking websites to mobile apps, you can also give your clients the easiest and most cost-effective way to boost to their SEO ranking.  Here's how it works:  * Simply drop your mobile friendly website URL into the AppNotch app.* The result is an amazing app with your all the design and functionality of your website as the UI plus a powerful app menu with app features like push notifications, message log, camera, cash register and more.* AppNotch publishes your app in the Google Play or iTunes public app stores for you or you can publish yourself using your certificates.* Your app is synchronized with your website. Anytime you update your website or app menu, your mobile app will be updated in real time with no need to republish to the app stores.* You can try your app for FREE. Preview your app on your phone by simply dropping in your URL into AppNotch and we will send you the link to Preview your app by text or email   Support -  https://addons.prestashop.com/en/contact-us?id_product=23574   Please Vote and EnjoyYour votes really make a difference! Thanks

module.name: bablic
module.description: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor. Choose from machine-translation, manual translation (do it yourself) or order professional human translation with just a click!
module.additional_description: Reach new customers globally in a matter of minutes & increase salesManually edit translations, replace images, fix style issues with just a click in our visual editorImmediately compete with the big guys using your fully localized PrestaShop store

module.name: chargeback
module.description: The Chargeback App is a dispute management platform for companies that want to be more efficient and effective minimizing lost revenue
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: The Chargeback App is a dispute management platform for companies that want to be more efficient and effective minimizing lost revenue.
module.additional_description: Consolidate all of your PrestaShop, payment gateway and merchant account data into a single platformQuickly respond to disputes with a full understanding of the orders status and dispute stageImprove dispute management and minimize lost revenue with expert support and guidance We know your goal is to maximize revenue, that’s why we created the Chargeback App. This dispute management platform picks up the ball where fraud scoring and manual reviews stop, enabling you to efficiently minimize lost revenue and increase profit. Identifying and gathering the data required to respond to a single dispute often requires logging into three separate systems, your storefront, payment gateway and merchant account processor. By consolidating the data from each, the Chargeback App helps you quickly take action like canceling an order and issuing a refund, or crafting a detailed document that adheres to the operating rules and regulations at Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. The Chargeback App provides expert guidance and support at every stage of the dispute lifecycle to ensure you protect your revenue.

module.name: wirecardceecheckoutseamless
module.description: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape.
module.additional_description: As a merchant based in Europe, offer your customers all over the world the opportunity to pay securely and conveniently at your online shop.  All standard payment methods (card payment, alternative methods incl. purchase on account with payment guarantee)Simple integrationAdditional premium servicesComprehensive support (via email, live chat, telephone)For merchants of all sizes and across all industriesIncluding fraud preventionPersonal merchant loginDetailed reportingOne interface for all payment methodsSolutions for your point of sale (POS, mPOS9)All the benefits of Wirecard AG (risk management, full banking licence, PCI certification)

module.name: xsellco
module.description: XSellco Fusion is the leading eCommerce Help Desk, tailored specifically for eCommerce businesses. Save time, respond faster and offer better customer support with XSellco Fusion
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: XSellco Fusion is the leading eCommerce Help Desk, tailored specifically for eCommerce businesses. Save time, respond faster and offer better customer support with XSellco Fusion. Start your 30 Day free trial today.
module.additional_description: Saves timeCuts costSimple to useFree live chat/contact formOne centralised inboxUnlimited usersUnlimited Channels24 hour response rate on all queriesCollaborative team dashboardNo Overlapping query responsesExpand globally with auto-translate featuresImprove customer satisfaction

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments.​Install Stripe's plugin on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account, and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Create your Stripe account in 10 minutes and immediately start accepting payments via Visa, MasterCard and American Express (no additional contract/merchant ID needed from your bank)Improve your conversion rate by offering a seamless payment experience to your customers: Stripe lets you host the payment form on your own pages, without redirection to a bank third-part pageKeep your fraud under control thanks to customizable 3D-Secure and Stripe Radar, our suite of anti-fraud toolsHundreds of third-part integrations to enrich your Stripe set-up (invoicing, SMS...) This plugin fully relies on Stripe.js to generate a token that gets used to create the charge with Stripe: sensitive data will never hit your servers, maintaining a high level of security and preventing you from a heavy PCI/DSS certification.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: adroll
module.description: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers.
module.additional_description: On average, only 96-98% of e-commerce store visitors leave before completing a purchase. AdRoll retargeting helps you reach those lost visitors personalized product recommendation ads across devices on the Web, Email, Facebook and Instagram. Our PrestaShop customers average a 7x ROI when using AdRoll: For every $10 spent, they see $70 in attributable revenue to AdRoll! This PrestaShop module streamlines the onboarding experience with AdRoll so you can start driving more sales faster! In just a few clicks, your store will be set up with the AdRoll pixel, essential audience segments, ROI/revenue tracking, and your synchronized product catalog for dynamic product recommendation ads. Other benefits:Use AdRoll to attract new visitors and retarget existing visitors across the web, mobile and Facebook.Make more sales and solve shopping cart abandonment like our 25,000+ customers.No minimums.Customer Support via Email, Chat & Phone.We'll even give you free ads!

module.name: worldcoo
module.displayName: Donation Widget | Collaborate with recognized NGOs
module.description: Foster loyalty among your clients and improve your brand image by offering a chance to support recognisable NGOs at no cost
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Foster loyalty among your clients and improve your brand image by offering a chance to support recognisable NGOs at no cost.
module.additional_description: Increase the conversion ratio of your e-commerce site:According to BBMG, more than two million [U1] consumers are redefining their purchasing habits and opting for responsible consumption.Improve your brand image and distinguish yourself from the competition: It has been confirmed that when companies show support for social causes, 93% of the public has a more positive image of the company.Promote loyalty among your users:Take advantage of the opportunity to show your social values. Collaborating in the financing of social projects will help you consolidate the connection with your clients, creating a dialogue and relationship.Take part in social change: Have you asked yourself how many transactions occur during one day? What would happen if we donated one euro with each transaction? Now, you and your clients have the opportunity to create social impact, quickly, easily and without cost.

module.name: cloudswipe
module.description: 150+ payment gateways included for free! Securely collect payments with Authorize.net, PayPal, Stripe, etc. on a PCI compliant page that looks exactly like your website
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: 150+ payment gateways included for free! Securely collect payments with Authorize.net, PayPal, Stripe, etc. on a PCI compliant page that looks exactly like your website.
module.additional_description: Security: The most secure way to collect payments onlineSimplicity: The easiest way to make your site PCI compliant.Savings: No need to buy other payment gateway add-ons. 150+ gateways included for free. No SSL required. CloudSwipe skins your hosted payment page with your PrestaShop theme so it looks exactly like the rest of your website. The most customizable, easiest to use, hosted payment page ever. You get:All the security for PCI compliant paymentsA secure payment page that looks exactly like the rest of your websiteSupport for over 150 payment gatewaysHappy customers confident in your securityPeace of mind You do NOT need:To buy a payment gateway module (150+ gateways are already integrated)Your own SSL certificate (payments are secured with SSL)To worry about security (we handle it for you)

module.name: upela
module.description: Deliver your clients’ orders using a urgent, express or economic service
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Deliver your clients’ orders using a urgent, express or economic service.Ship within your country and beyond! (More than 220 destinations available)Without subscription, save money with Upela and enjoy a quality service.
module.additional_description: With Upela it has never been so easy for e-merchants and SMEs to ship. Upela displays only the best shipping offers, at the best price and always with the best quality of service.The UPELA shipping module facilitates access to: - door-to-door deliveries and dropoff services - professional automation tools reducing your daily workload With Upela keep your customers informed in real time about their delivery status.Take advantage of the best offers from reliable carriers while using an integrated tool that will make your shipping management much easier!Improve the quality of your delivery services and keep your customers coming back!

module.name: mailchimpintegration
module.description: Connect your store, sell more stuff. More than 15 million people use MailChimp to create targeted email & ad campaigns to help grow their business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your store, sell more stuff. More than 15 million people use MailChimp to create targeted email & ad campaigns to help grow their business. When you add the official MailChimp module to your store, you increase the power of both.
module.additional_description: See detailed campaign reports—from engagement to ROI—so you can sell more stuff.Sync and segment your list, then send targeted campaigns based on things like products purchased and amount spent over time.Create abandoned cart emails, send product recommendations, and more.Follow up with, delight, and re-engage your customers using pre-built customer lifecycle automations.Design and send personalized transactional messages—like shipping notifications, invoices, and more—directly through MailChimp.
